data.pricing_trends: Prices for flights and accommodations tend to rise during holiday seasons, with the highest prices seen around Christmas and New Yearâ€™s.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking window is 3-6 months in advance for best rates. Last-minute deals may be available but are less predictable.
data.demand: Interest in winter travel to Iceland is increasing, especially for unique experiences like the Northern Lights.
data.competition: Competing destinations include Norway and Finland, known for similar winter experiences, but Iceland offers unique geographical features.
